start.speaker: Narrator
start.text:
Tracks appear where no one walked. Then they return facing the wrong way.

Something is learning how travelers pretend to be safe.

choices.text: Mark the false trail and warn others.
Follow it to see whatâ€™s copying you.

end.speaker: Narrator
end.text: You leave proof behind: either a warning for others, or bait for what is watching.
